def solve_linear_system(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, rhs) = test_cases[i]
        rsum = sum(rhs) * (N - 1)
        result = [str(int(rsum - m)) for m in rhs]
        results.append(result)
    return results

        rsum = sum(rhs) // (N - 1)
        result = [str(int(rsum - m)) for m in rhs]
        results.append(result)
    return results

def solve_linear_system(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, rhs) = test_cases[i]
        rsum = sum(rhs) / (N - 1)
        result = [str(int(rsum * m)) for m in rhs]
        results.append(result)
    return results
